text: Derek Leckenby (14 May 1943 \- 4 June 1994) in Leeds, Yorkshire, England) played lead guitar for Herman's Hermits. Leckenby co-founded Pluto Music with Herman's Hermits member Keith Hopwood. Pluto music produced music for childrens television. His nickname was "Lek". He died of Non-Hodgkin lymphoma on 4 June 1994 at the age of 51. == References == Category:1943 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Musicians from Manchester Category:Members of Herman's Hermits
title: Derek Leckenby
